page.shortlink: api objects thread ui disabled function
page.description: Returns .T. if current thread has UI disabled.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the thread status. If thread status is .T., the thread is disabled. If the status is .F., the thread is not disabled.

discussion.p: The *[xb:.ui_disabled()]* method returns the disabled status of the current thread. If the thread is disabled, UI elements, such as message boxes or progress dialogs, will not be shown.

page.example:
dim tPtr as P tPtr = thread.current()
? tPtr.name() = "Main"
? tPtr.ui_disabled() = .F.
